item.title: Ka'au Crater Boys - 'Opihi Man - Key of G - Ukulele Play-Alongs!
item.description: Play along video for the song 'Opihi Man by Ka'au Crater Boys from the channel Ukulele Play-Alongs!. Chords used in the song: A7, C, D7, E7, G, G7.

item.title: Taylor Swift - Love Story - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Love Story by Taylor Swift from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, B, Bm, C♯m, D, E, G.

item.title: Patience and Prudence & Eddie Vedder & Nancy Sinatra - Tonight You Belong To Me - Key of C - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Tonight You Belong To Me by Patience and Prudence & Eddie Vedder & Nancy Sinatra from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A7, C, C7, D7, F, Fm, G.

item.title: Harry Styles - Adore You - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Adore You by Harry Styles from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am7, C, F, G.

item.title: Doris Day - Que Sera Sera - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Que Sera Sera by Doris Day from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, A7, D, D6, D7, Dmaj7, Em, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Queen of Silver Linings by Amy Allen from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, F, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Cardigan by Taylor Swift from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Dm, F, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song I Make My Own Sunshine by Alyssa Bonagura from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Robbie Williams - Feel - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Feel by Robbie Williams from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: A, A7, Am, B♭, C, Dm, F, G, Gm.

item.description: Play along video for the song Birds by Dodie Clark & Thomas Sanders from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, Bm, C, D, D7, E7, Em, F♯7, F♯m, G, Gm.

item.title: Michael Crawford - The Music of the Night - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song The Music of the Night by Michael Crawford from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A♭, B, B♭, C, C♯m, D, D7, Dm, E, Em, E♭, F, G, G7.
